interest: - Characterising and elucidating the mode of action of polyanions that can neutralise the cytotoxic properties of histones involved in neutrophil extracellular traps (NETs) formed in response to pathogens and tissue injury.- Cancer Immunotherapy.
ANU.biography: Farzaneh is also a member of Board of Directors and State Convener at the Australian Society for Madical Research (ASMR), CHM Early Career Academic Staff Development Committee member and NECTAR custodian.
project: - Characterising and elucidating the mode of action of polyanions that can neutralise the cytotoxic properties of histones involved in neutrophil extracellular traps (NETs) formed in response to pathogens and tissue injury.
